text: Luciana Marcellini (born 12 January 1948) is a retired Italian swimmer. She competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in the 200 m breaststroke event, but was eliminated in the preliminaries. Aged 12 years and 228 days she was the youngest participant at the 1960 games.1960 Roma Summer Games. sports- reference.com ==References== Category:Female breaststroke swimmers Category:Swimmers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Italian female swimmers Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic swimmers of Italy
title: Luciana Marcellini
